(ì§€ì •í•˜ì§€ ì•Šì•˜ë‹¤ë©´ defaultê°’ì´ í´ë˜ìŠ¤ì´ë¦„ì´ë‹¤.) ì´ì™€ê°™ì´ JPQLì—ì„œëŠ” ì§€ê¸ˆê¹Œì§€ í•™ìŠµí•œ JPA ë¬¸ë²•ë“¤ê³¼ ë™ì¼í•˜ê²Œ ê°ì²´ë¥¼ ì¤‘ì‹¬ìœ¼ë¡œ ì¿¼ë¦¬ë¥¼ ì‘ì„±í•˜ê²Œ ëœë‹¤. ì§€ê¸ˆë¶€í„° ì´ëŸ¬í•œ JPQLì— ëŒ€í•´ ë”ìš± êµ¬ì²´ì ìœ¼ë¡œ ì•Œì•„ë³´ê² ë‹¤.

2. ê¸°ë³¸ ë¬¸ë²•

5. í”„ë¡œì ì…˜ (SELECT)

5.1. í”„ë¡œì ì…˜ ì¡°íšŒ íƒ€ì…

ì•ì„œ ë°˜ë³µí•´ì„œ ë§í–ˆë“¯ì´ JPQLì—ì„œëŠ” í…Œì´ë¸”ì´ ì•„ë‹Œ ì—”í‹°í‹°(ê°ì²´)ë¥¼ ëŒ€ìƒìœ¼ë¡œ ì¿¼ë¦¬ë¥¼ ì‘ì„±í•œë‹¤. JPQLì´ í”„ë¡œì ì…˜ì„ í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆëŠ” ëŒ€ìƒìœ¼ë¡œëŠ” ì—”í‹°í‹° íƒ€ì… , ì—”í‹°í‹°ì— ì†í•œ ì¸ë² ë””ë“œ íƒ€ì…, ìŠ¤ì¹¼ë¼ íƒ€ì…ì´ ì¡´ì¬í•œë‹¤.

ì˜ˆì‹œë¥¼ ì‚´í´ë³´ë©´ ìœ„ì— ìœ„ì¹˜í•œ ì½”ë“œëŠ” ì—”í‹°í‹°ë¥¼ ì‹ë³„ìë¡œ ë°›ì•„ ì¡°íšŒë¥¼ í•˜ê³  ì•„ë˜ì˜ ì½”ë“œëŠ” memberIdë¼ëŠ” ì‹ë³„ìë¥¼ ë°›ì•„ ì¡°íšŒë¥¼ í•˜ê³  ìˆë‹¤. í•˜ì§€ë§Œ ë‘ ì½”ë“œì˜ ê²°ê³¼ë¡œ ì‹¤í–‰ë˜ëŠ” ì¿¼ë¦¬ëŠ” ëª¨ë‘ select m.* from Member m where m.id=? ì™€ ê°™ì´ ì‹ë³„ìë¥¼ ê¸°ì¤€ìœ¼ë¡œ ì¡°íšŒë˜ê²Œ ëœë‹¤. ì¦‰, ì‹ë³„ìê°€ ì•„ë‹Œ ì—”í‹°í‹°ë¥¼ ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ì—¬ë„ JPAëŠ” ì‹ë³„ìë¥¼ ìë™ìœ¼ë¡œ ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ê²Œ ëœë‹¤.

6. Parameter Binding

JPQLì—ì„œ íŒŒë¼ë¯¸í„°ë¥¼ ë„£ì–´ì£¼ê¸° ìœ„í•´ì„œëŠ” setParameter() ë©”ì„œë“œë¥¼ ì´ìš©í•´ í• ë‹¹í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆë‹¤.

  • íŒŒë¼ë¯¸í„° ê¸°ë°˜ í• ë‹¹

7. í˜ì´ì§• (Paging)

í˜ì´ì§•ì„ ìœ„í•œ ë°ì´í„° ì¡°íšŒë¥¼ í•˜ê¸° ìœ„í•´ì„œëŠ” ì•„ë˜ì™€ ê°™ì´ ëª‡ í˜ì´ì§€ë¶€í„° ëª‡ ê°œì˜ ë°ì´í„°ë¥¼ ê°€ì ¸ì˜¬ì§€ì˜ ì„¤ì •ì´ í•„ìš”í•´ JPQL parameter bindingìœ¼ë¡œ êµ¬í˜„ì‹œ ë§ì€ ì–´ë ¤ì›€ì„ ëŠë‚„ ìˆ˜ ìˆë‹¤.

JPAì—ì„œëŠ” ì´ëŸ¬í•œ ë¶ˆì¼ì¹˜ë¥¼ ìë™ìœ¼ë¡œ ì—°ê²° í…Œì´ë¸”ì„ ë§Œë“¤ì–´ì£¼ë©° í•´ê²°í•˜ì˜€ìœ¼ë‚˜ ì‹¤ì œ ì‹¤ë¬´ì—ì„œ ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ëŠ” ì¤‘ê°„ í…Œì´ë¸”ì€ ë‹¨ìˆœ ì—°ê²°ë¡œ ëë‚˜ëŠ” ê²ƒì´ ì•„ë‹Œ ì¶”ê°€ì ì¸ ë°ì´í„°ë¥¼ ë„£ê²Œ ë˜ëŠ” ê²½ìš°ê°€ ë§ì•„ @ManyToManyì˜ ì‚¬ìš©ì€ ì§€ì–‘í•˜ê³  ì¤‘ê°„ ì—°ê²° í…Œì´ë¸”ìš© ì—”í‹°í‹°ë¥¼ ì¶”ê°€í•˜ì—¬ @OneToMany, @ManyToOneìœ¼ë¡œ í’€ì–´ì„œ í‘œí˜„í•˜ëŠ” ê²ƒì´ ì¢‹ë‹¤.

@ManyToManyë¥¼ ì‚¬ìš©í•œë‹¤ë©´ ì¤‘ê°„ ì—°ê²° í…Œì´ë¸”ì— ëŒ€í•œ ì„¤ì •ì„ @JoinTable ì–´ë…¸í…Œì´ì…˜ì„ í†µí•´ í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆë‹¤.

6. êµ¬í˜„ íŒ ğŸ“Œ

ê°ì²´ì§€í–¥ì ìœ¼ë¡œ êµ¬í˜„ì„ ìƒê°í•˜ì˜€ì„ ë•Œ ì–‘ë°©í–¥ ì—°ê´€ê´€ê³„ëŠ” ì‹ ê²½ì¨ì•¼í•  ê²ƒì´ ë§ë‹¤. ê·¸ë˜ì„œ ê°€ëŠ¥í•˜ë©´ ê°ì²´ê°„ì˜ ê´€ê³„ëŠ” ë‹¨ë°©í–¥ìœ¼ë¡œ ë§Œë“œëŠ” ê²ƒì´ ì¢‹ë‹¤. ì²˜ìŒì— DB ì„¤ê³„ë¥¼ í•  ë•ŒëŠ” ì¼ë‹¨ ë‹¨ë°©í–¥ ë§¤í•‘ìœ¼ë¡œ ì„¤ê³„ë¥¼ ì™„ë£Œí•˜ëŠ” ê²ƒì´ ì¢‹ë‹¤. ê·¸ í›„ì— ê°œë°œì„ ì§„í–‰í•˜ë©° ì¡°íšŒ ê¸°ëŠ¥ë“¤ì„ ì¶”ê°€í•  ë•Œ ë°˜ëŒ€ ë°©í–¥ì„ ì¶”ê°€í•˜ë©° í•„ìš”í•œ ê²½ìš°ì—ë§Œ ì–‘ë°©í–¥ì„ ë§Œë“œëŠ” ê²ƒì´ ì¢‹ë‹¤.

í•´ë‹¹ í¬ìŠ¤íŠ¸ëŠ” ì¸í”„ëŸ° ê¹€ì˜í•œë‹˜ì˜ ìë°” ORM í‘œì¤€ JPA í”„ë¡œê·¸ë˜ë° - ê¸°ë³¸í¸ ê°•ì˜ë¥¼ ê¸°ë°˜ìœ¼ë¡œ ì‘ì„±í•˜ì˜€ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.

1. JPAì˜ Entityë€?

ì´ì™€ ê°™ì´ ê°„ë‹¨íˆ ì–´ë…¸í…Œì´ì…˜ë§Œ ë¶™ì—¬ì£¼ë©´ ì—”í‹°í‹° ì„¤ì •ì´ ëë‚˜ì§€ë§Œ ëª‡ê°€ì§€ ì£¼ì˜í•  ì ì´ ì¡´ì¬í•œë‹¤. ë¨¼ì € JPAë¥¼ êµ¬í˜„í•˜ì—¬ ì“°ëŠ” ë¼ì´ë¸ŒëŸ¬ë¦¬ë“¤ì´ Reflectionì„ ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ëŠ” ê²½ìš°ê°€ ìˆê¸°ì— ê¸°ë³¸ ìƒì„±ìë¥¼ í•„ìˆ˜ë¡œ ì‘ì„±í•´ì¤˜ì•¼ í•œë‹¤. í•´ë‹¹ ìƒì„±ìëŠ” public ë˜ëŠ” protected ìƒì„±ìë¡œ ë§Œë“¤ì–´ì£¼ë©´ ëœë‹¤. ë‘ë²ˆì§¸ë¡œ @Entity ì–´ë…¸í…Œì´ì…˜ì€ final, enum, interface, innerí´ë˜ìŠ¤ì—ëŠ” ì‚¬ìš©í•  ìˆ˜ ì—†ë‹¤. ë§ˆì§€ë§‰ìœ¼ë¡œ DBì— ì €ì¥í•  í•„ë“œì—ëŠ” final í‚¤ì›Œë“œë¥¼ ì‘ì„±í•˜ë©´ ì•ˆëœë‹¤.

ì´ì œ JPAì˜ ì—”í‹°í‹°ì— ëŒ€í•´ ì•Œì•˜ìœ¼ë‹ˆ @Entity ì–´ë…¸í…Œì´ì…˜ ë° JPAì˜ ì—”í‹°í‹° ì„¤ì • ê´€ë ¨ ì–´ë…¸í…Œì´ì…˜ë“¤ì— ëŒ€í•´ ì•Œì•„ë³´ê² ë‹¤.

2. Entityë¥¼ DB í…Œì´ë¸”ì— ë§¤í•‘í•˜ê¸°

2.1. @Entity

@Entity ì–´ë…¸í…Œì´ì…˜ì€ ì•ì„œ ë§í–ˆë“¯ì´ JPAì—ì„œ ì—”í‹°ë¡œ ê´€ë¦¬í•˜ê³  ì‹¶ì€ í´ë˜ìŠ¤ ìœ„ì— ë¶™ì—¬ì£¼ë©´ JPAëŠ” â€œì´ í´ë˜ìŠ¤ëŠ” ë‚´ê°€ ì—”í‹°í‹°ë¡œ ê´€ë¦¬í•  í´ë˜ìŠ¤ì´êµ¬ë‚˜!â€ë¼ ì¸ì§€í•˜ê³  ì§ì ‘ ê´€ë¦¬ë¥¼ í•˜ê²Œ ëœë‹¤.

@Entityì˜ ì†ì„±ì€ name ì†ì„±ë§Œ ì¡´ì¬í•œë‹¤. í•´ë‹¹ ì†ì„±ì€ JPAì—ì„œ ì‚¬ìš©í•  ì—”í‹°í‹° ì´ë¦„ì„ ì§€ì •í•˜ëŠ” ì†ì„±ì´ë‹¤. ê¸°ë³¸ ê°’ìœ¼ë¡œëŠ” í´ë˜ìŠ¤ì˜ ì´ë¦„ì„ ê·¸ëŒ€ë¡œ ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ê²Œ ë˜ë©° ë‹¤ë¥¸ íŒ¨í‚¤ì§€ì— ê°™ì€ ì´ë¦„ì˜ í´ë˜ìŠ¤ê°€ ìˆëŠ” ê²ƒì´ ì•„ë‹ˆë¼ë©´ ê°€ê¸‰ì  ê¸°ë³¸ ê°’ì„ ì‚¬ìš©í•œë‹¤.

2.2. @Table

3. ê¸°ë³¸ í‚¤(PK) ë§¤í•‘í•˜ê¸°

DB í…Œì´ë¸”ì—ëŠ” í•­ìƒ ê¸°ë³¸ í‚¤ê°€ ì¡´ì¬í•œë‹¤. EntityëŠ” DBí…Œì´ë¸”ì— ë§¤í•‘ì´ ë˜ëŠ” ë§Œí¼ ê¸°ë³¸í‚¤ì— ë§¤í•‘ë˜ëŠ” í•„ë“œê°€ í•„ìˆ˜ì ìœ¼ë¡œ í•„ìš”í•˜ë‹¤. JPAì—ì„œëŠ” ê¸°ë³¸í‚¤ ì„¤ì •ê³¼ ê´€ë ¨í•˜ì—¬ @Id, @GeneratedValue ì–´ë…¸í…Œì´ì…˜ì„ ì œê³µí•˜ê³  ìˆë‹¤.

3.1. @Id

@Id ì–´ë…¸í…Œì´ì…˜ì€ í•´ë‹¹ ì–´ë…¸í…Œì´ì…˜ì´ ë¶™ì€ í•„ë“œê°€ â€œì´ í•„ë“œê°€ ê¸°ë³¸í‚¤ì— ë§¤í•‘ë˜ëŠ” í•„ë“œì´ë‹¤!â€ ë¼ê³  ì•Œë ¤ì£¼ëŠ” ì–´ë…¸í…Œì´ì…˜ì´ë‹¤. Idë¥¼ ì§ì ‘ í• ë‹¹í•´ì£¼ê³  ì‹¶ìœ¼ë©´ @Id ì–´ë…¸í…Œì´ì…˜ë§Œì„ ë¶™ì¸ í›„ì— ì§ì ‘ í• ë‹¹í•´ì£¼ë©´ ëœë‹¤. í•˜ì§€ë§Œ ì¼ë°˜ì ìœ¼ë¡œ IdëŠ” MySQLì˜ auto_incrementì™€ ê°™ì´ ë°ì´í„°ë² ì´ìŠ¤ì—ì„œ ìë™ìœ¼ë¡œ í• ë‹¹í•´ì£¼ëŠ” ë°©ë²•ì„ ì‚¬ìš©í•œë‹¤. í•´ë‹¹ ê¸°ëŠ¥ì„ ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ê¸° ìœ„í•´ì„œëŠ” @GeneratedValueì„ ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ë©´ ëœë‹¤.

3.2. @GeneratedValue

@GeneratedValue ì€ @Id ì–´ë…¸í…Œì´ì…˜ê³¼ í•­ìƒ ë¶™ì–´ë‹¤ë‹ˆëŠ” ì–´ë…¸í…Œì´ì…˜ìœ¼ë¡œ ì—”í‹°í‹° ë°ì´í„°ë¥¼ DBì— ì €ì¥í•  ë•Œ ê¸°ë³¸í‚¤ë¥¼ ìë™ìœ¼ë¡œ ìƒì„±í•´ì£¼ëŠ” ì–´ë…¸í…Œì´ì…˜ì´ë‹¤. í•´ë‹¹ ì–´ë…¸í…Œë‹ˆì…˜ì—ëŠ” 4ê°€ì§€ ì„¤ì •ì´ ì¡´ì¬í•œë‹¤.

  • GenerationType.IDENTITY

    • ê¸°ë³¸ í‚¤ ìƒì„±ì„ ë°ì´í„°ë² ì´ìŠ¤ì— ìœ„ì„í•˜ëŠ” ì „ëµì´ë‹¤. ì‹¤ì œë¡œ ì‹¤í–‰ë˜ëŠ” insertì¿¼ë¦¬ë¥¼ ë³´ë©´ idì˜ ê°’ì€ nullì¸ ìƒíƒœë¡œ ì‹¤í–‰ëœë‹¤.
    • Identity ì „ëµì„ ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ì—¬ auto incrementë¥¼ í•˜ëŠ” ê²½ìš°ì—ëŠ” DBì— ì¿¼ë¦¬ë¥¼ ë‚ ë ¤ì•¼ì§€ PKê°’ì´ í• ë‹¹ë˜ì–´ì„œ íŠ¸ëœì­ì…˜ì´ ëë‚ ë•Œê°€ ì•„ë‹Œ persist()ë¥¼ í•  ë•Œ Insert SQLì„ ë³´ë‚´ì–´ PKê°’ì„ ê°€ì ¸ì˜¨ë‹¤.
    • PKê°’ì„ DBì— ë“¤ì–´ê°„ ì´í›„ì— ì•Œ ìˆ˜ ìˆì–´ì„œ Insert ì¿¼ë¦¬ë¥¼ ëª¨ì•„ì„œ í•œë²ˆì— ë³´ë‚´ëŠ”ê²Œ ë¶ˆê°€ëŠ¥í•˜ë‹¤ëŠ” ë‹¨ì ì´ ìˆë‹¤.
    • ì£¼ë¡œ MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQL Server, DB2ì—ì„œ ì‚¬ìš©í•œë‹¤.

  • GenerationType.SEQUENCE

    • ë°ì´í„°ë² ì´ìŠ¤ ì‹œí€€ìŠ¤ ì˜¤ë¸Œì íŠ¸ë¥¼ ì‚¬ìš©í•œë‹¤.
    • í•´ë‹¹ ë°©ë²•ì„ ì‚¬ìš©í•  ë•ŒëŠ” ë§¤í•‘í•  ë°ì´í„°ë² ì´ìŠ¤ ì‹œí€€ìŠ¤ê°€ í•„ìš”í•˜ì—¬ @SquenceGeneratorë¥¼ í†µí•œ ì¶”ê°€ ì„¤ì •ì´ í•„ìš”í•˜ë‹¤.

    • ì‹œí€€ìŠ¤ ë°©ë²•ì€ IDENTITYì™€ ë‹¤ë¥´ê²Œ DBì— PKê°’ì´ ì—†ëŠ” ì±„ë¡œ ë°ì´í„°ë¥¼ ë³´ë‚´ëŠ” ê²ƒì´ ì•„ë‹ˆë¼ ë¨¼ì € Sequence Generatorë¥¼ DB ì„œë²„ì—ì„œ ì°¾ì•„ì„œ ë‹¤ìŒë²ˆì— ì‚¬ìš©í•  PKê°’ì„ callí•´ì„œ ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¨ë‹¤. ê·¸ í›„ ì• í”Œë¦¬ì¼€ì´ì…˜ì—ì„œ PKë¥¼ ê°ì²´ì— í• ë‹¹í•˜ì—¬ ì˜ì†ì„± ì»¨í…ìŠ¤íŠ¸ì— ë³´ê´€í•œë‹¤. ë•ë¶„ì— ë°ì´í„°ë¥¼ ì €ì¥í•  ë•Œ ë°”ë¡œ Insert ì¿¼ë¦¬ë¥¼ ë‚ ë¦¬ì§€ ì•Šì•„ë„ ëœë‹¤.

      • í•´ë‹¹ ë°©ë²•ì„ ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ë©´ ë§¤ë²ˆ sequenceë¥¼ ë°›ì•„ì™€ì•¼í•´ì„œ ì„±ëŠ¥ìƒì˜ ì†í•´ë¥¼ ë³¼ ìˆ˜ ìˆë‹¤. í•´ë‹¹ ì†í•´ëŠ” @SquenceGeneratorì˜ allocationSize ì†ì„±ì„ ì„¤ì •í•˜ë©´ ì†í•´ë¥¼ ì¤„ì¼ ìˆ˜ ìˆë‹¤.

        • allocationSizeì„¤ì •ìœ¼ë¡œ ì–»ëŠ” ì´ì  - ë°ì´í„°ë² ì´ìŠ¤ ì‹œí€€ìŠ¤ë¥¼ í•œë²ˆì— ì„¤ì •í•œ ê°œìˆ˜ë¥¼ ì¦ê°€ì‹œí‚µë‹ˆë‹¤. ë°ì´í„°ë² ì´ìŠ¤ ì‹œí€€ìŠ¤ë¥¼ ìƒì„±í•  ë•Œ í•œë²ˆ í˜¸ì¶œì— 50ì”© ì¦ê°€í•˜ê²Œ ë§Œë“¤ ìˆ˜ ìˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. ê·¸ëŸ¬ë©´ ì²˜ìŒì— ì‹œí€€ìŠ¤ê°€ 1ì´ë©´ ì´ ì‹œí€€ìŠ¤ë¥¼ í˜¸ì¶œí•˜ë©´ 50ì´ ë˜ê² ì§€ìš”.ê·¸ëŸ¬ë©´ ì• í”Œë¦¬ì¼€ì´ì…˜ì—ì„œëŠ” 1~50ë²ˆê¹Œì§€ëŠ” ë©”ëª¨ë¦¬ì—ì„œ ê°’ì„ êº¼ë‚´ì„œ ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ê³ , 51ì´ ë˜ëŠ” ìˆœê°„ DB ì‹œí€€ìŠ¤ë¥¼ í˜¸ì¶œí•©ë‹ˆë‹¤. ê·¸ëŸ¬ë©´ DB ì‹œí€€ìŠ¤ê°€ 50 -> 100ì´ ë˜ê² ì§€ìš”. ê·¸ëŸ¬ë©´ ì• í”Œë¦¬ì¼€ì´ì…˜ì€ 51~100ê¹Œì§€ ë©”ëª¨ë¦¬ì—ì„œ ê°’ì„ ì¦ê°€ì‹œí‚¤ë©´ì„œ ì‚¬ìš©í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤. ê²°ê³¼ì ìœ¼ë¡œ ì• í”Œë¦¬ì¼€ì´ì…˜ì€ 50ë²ˆì— 1ë²ˆë§Œ DBë¥¼ í˜¸ì¶œí•´ì„œ ì‹œí€€ìŠ¤ë¥¼ ì¦ê°€ì‹œí‚¤ë©´ ë©ë‹ˆë‹¤. ì´ë ‡ê²Œ í•˜ë©´ ë„¤íŠ¸ì›Œí¬ í˜¸ì¶œì´ ì¤„ì–´ì„œ ì„±ëŠ¥ì´ í–¥ìƒë©ë‹ˆë‹¤^^
    • ì˜ì†ì„± ì»¨í…ìŠ¤íŠ¸ì— ê°ì²´ë¥¼ ì¶”ê°€í•  ë•Œ ì´ë¯¸ PKê°’ì„ ì•Œ ìˆ˜ ìˆì–´ ì—¬ëŸ¬ ë°ì´í„°ì— ëŒ€í•´ bufferì— ëª¨ì•„ì„œ í•œë²ˆì— insert queryë¥¼ ë³´ë‚¼ ìˆ˜ ìˆë‹¤.
    • Oracle, PostgreSQL, DB2, H2 ë°ì´í„°ë² ì´ìŠ¤ì—ì„œ ì‚¬ìš©í•œë‹¤.

  • GenerationType.TABLE

    • ê° í…Œì´ë¸”ì˜ next sequence valueì˜ ê°’ì„ ê°–ëŠ” í…Œì´ë¸”ì„ ìƒì„±í•˜ì—¬ í…Œì´ë¸”ì— ê°’ì„ ì¶”ê°€í•  ë•ŒëŠ” í•´ë‹¹ ì‹œí€€ìŠ¤ í…Œì´ë¸”ì˜ ê°’ì„ ì½ì–´ì˜¤ê³  ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸í•˜ë©´ì„œ idë¥¼ ì •í•œë‹¤.

ê·¸ëŸ¬ë˜ ì¤‘ ì•Œê²Œëœ ê²ƒì´ JPAì˜ Specificationì´ë‹¤.

JPA Specificationë€?

public interface JpaSpecificationExecutor<T> {

    ...

2. Specification ë§Œë“¤ê¸°

Specificationì€ ê¸°ë³¸ì ìœ¼ë¡œ ì•„ë˜ì™€ ê°™ì€ êµ¬ì¡°ë¡œ ì´ë£¨ì–´ì ¸ ìˆë‹¤. ìš°ë¦¬ëŠ” êµ¬í˜„ í•˜ë ¤ëŠ” ì¡°ê±´(í•„í„°)ë³„ë¡œ Specificationì„ ë§Œë“¤ì–´ ë‘”ë‹¤ë©´ ì•ì„œ JpaSpecificationExecutor ì˜ ìƒì†ì„ í†µí•´ ì‚¬ìš© ê°€ëŠ¥í•´ì§„ findAll(Specification<T> spec); ì„ í†µí•´ where ì¡°ê±´ë¬¸ì´ ê±¸ë¦° ì¿¼ë¦¬ë¥¼ ì‰½ê²Œ ë‚ ë¦´ ìˆ˜ ìˆë‹¤.

ì•„ì§ê¹Œì§€ Specificationì˜ ì´ì ì´ ë¬´ì—‡ì¸ì§€ í¬ê²Œ ëŠë¼ì§€ ëª»í•˜ì˜€ì„ ê²ƒì´ë‹¤. Specificationì€ í•˜ë‚˜ë§Œ ìˆì„ ë•ŒëŠ” ì´ì ì„ í¬ê²Œ ëŠë¼ì§€ ëª»í•˜ë©° ì—¬ëŸ¬ê°œì˜ Specificaitonì„ and(), or() ê³¼ ê°™ì€ ì—°ì‚°ìœ¼ë¡œ ë¬¶ìœ¼ë©´ ë¹„ë¡œì†Œ ì´ì ì„ ëŠë‚„ ìˆ˜ ìˆë‹¤.

public interface Specification<T> { 
    Predicate toPredicate(Root<T> root, CriteriaQuery<?> query,

}

ì•ì„œ ë§í–ˆë˜ ì¡°ê±´ë“¤ì„ í†µí•´ êµ¬í˜„í•œ Specificationë“¤ì€ ë‹¤ìŒê³¼ ê°™ë‹¤.

package com.woowacourse.momo.group.domain.group;

import javax.persistence.criteria.Expression;
import javax.persistence.criteria.Join;
import javax.persistence.criteria.Predicate;

import org.springframework.data.jpa.domain.Specification;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Component;

import com.woowacourse.momo.category.domain.Category;
import com.woowacourse.momo.member.domain.Member;
import com.woowacourse.momo.participant.domain.Participant;

public class GroupSpecification {

    public static Specification<Group> initialize() {
        return (root, query, criteriaBuilder) -> criteriaBuilder.conjunction();
    }

    public static Specification<Group> filterByParticipated(Member member) {
        return (root, query, criteriaBuilder) -> {
            Join<Participant, Group> groupParticipant = root.join("participants");
            return criteriaBuilder.equal(groupParticipant.get("member"), member);
        };
    }

    public static Specification<Group> filterByHosted(Member member) {
        return (root, query, criteriaBuilder) -> criteriaBuilder.equal(root.get("host"), member);
    }

    public static Specification<Group> filterByCategory(Long categoryId) {
        Category category = Category.from(categoryId);
        return (root, query, criteriaBuilder) -> criteriaBuilder.equal(root.get("category"), category);
    }

    public static Specification<Group> containKeyword(String keyword) {
        return (root, query, criteriaBuilder) -> {
            Predicate nameContainKeyword = criteriaBuilder.like(root.get("name"), "%" + keyword + "%");
            Predicate descriptionContainKeyword = criteriaBuilder.like(root.get("description"), "%" + keyword + "%");
            return criteriaBuilder.or(nameContainKeyword, descriptionContainKeyword);
        };
    }

    public static Specification<Group> excludeFinished() {
        return (root, query, criteriaBuilder) -> {
            root.join("participants");
            query.groupBy(root.get("id"));

            Expression<Long> count = criteriaBuilder.count(root.get("id"));
            Predicate isOverCapacity = criteriaBuilder.lessThan(count, root.get("capacity"));
            query.having(isOverCapacity);

            Predicate isEarlyClosed = criteriaBuilder.isFalse(root.get("isEarlyClosed"));
            Predicate isOverDeadline = criteriaBuilder.greaterThan(root.get("deadline"),
                    criteriaBuilder.currentTimestamp());
            return criteriaBuilder.and(isEarlyClosed, isOverDeadline);
        };
    }

    public static Specification<Group> orderByDeadline() {
        return (root, query, criteriaBuilder) -> {
            query.orderBy(criteriaBuilder.asc(root.get("deadline")), criteriaBuilder.desc(root.get("id")));
            return criteriaBuilder.greaterThan(root.get("deadline"), criteriaBuilder.currentTimestamp());
        };
    }

    public static Specification<Group> orderByIdDesc() {
        return (root, query, criteriaBuilder) -> {
            query.orderBy(criteriaBuilder.desc(root.get("id")));
            return criteriaBuilder.conjunction();
        };
    }
}

3. Sprcificationì„ í†µí•´ ë™ì  ì¿¼ë¦¬ ë§Œë“¤ê¸°

ë¨¼ì € í•„í„°ë§ ê¸°ëŠ¥ì´ ë“¤ì–´ê°€ëŠ” ëª¨ì„ ì¡°íšŒ ì»¨íŠ¸ë¡¤ëŸ¬ ë©”ì„œë“œì™€ ModelAttributeë¡œ ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ëŠ” DTOëŠ” ë‹¤ìŒê³¼ ê°™ë‹¤.

ì»¨íŠ¸ë¡¤ëŸ¬ë¥¼ ë³´ë©´ ì•Œ ìˆ˜ ìˆë“¯ì´ ìš”ì²­ì„ Query Parameterë¡œ ë°›ê²Œ ë˜ê³  ê°ê°ì˜ íŒŒë¼ë¯¸í„°ë“¤ì€ í•„ìˆ˜ ì¡°ê±´ì´ ì—†ì–´ ì„ íƒëœ í•„í„°ë§ ì¡°ê±´ì— ë”°ë¼ ìš”ì²­ì´ ë‚ ë¼ì˜¬ ê²ƒì´ë‹¤. ì¦‰, ì¹´í…Œê³ ë¦¬ ì¡°íšŒë§Œì„ ì„ íƒí•  ê²½ìš° /api/groups?category=1 ìœ¼ë¡œ ì¹´í…Œê³ ë¦¬+í‚¤ì›Œë“œì˜ ì¡°í•©ì´ë©´ /api/groups?category=1&keyword=ìŠ¤í„°ë”” ì™€ ê°™ì€ URLë¡œ ìš”ì²­ì´ ì˜¬ ê²ƒì´ë‹¤. ModelAttribute íŠ¹ì„±ìƒ Setterì£¼ì…ì„ í•˜ê²Œ ë˜ì–´ íŒŒë¼ë¯¸í„°ì— í•´ë‹¹ë˜ëŠ” ë‚´ìš©ì´ ì—†ìœ¼ë©´ í•´ë‹¹ ë‚´ìš©ì€ ì´ˆê¸°í™” ê³¼ì •ì´ ì—†ì–´ nullê°’ì´ ë“¤ì–´ê°€ê²Œ ë  ê²ƒì´ê³  ìš°ë¦¬ëŠ” ì´ ì ì„ ì´ìš©í•˜ì—¬ ìµœì¢… Specificationì„ ë§Œë“œëŠ” ë¡œì§ì„ ì‘ì„±í•˜ë©´ ëœë‹¤.

ì‘ì„± ë¡œì§ì€ ì•„ë˜ì™€ ê°™ë‹¤. ë¨¼ì € Specification.whereë¥¼ í†µí•´ ì´ˆê¸° Specification ê°ì²´ë¥¼ ë§Œë“¤ê³  DTOì˜ í•„ë“œë“¤ì„ ê°ê° ìˆœíšŒí•˜ë©° null ìœ ë¬´ë¥¼ íŒë‹¨í•œë‹¤. nullì´ ì•„ë‹ ê²½ìš° í•´ë‹¹ í•„í„°ëŠ” ì„ íƒëœ ê²ƒì´ê¸°ì— ê´€ë ¨ Specificationì„ and()ë¥¼ í†µí•´ ì—°ê²°í•´ì£¼ê³  nullì¼ ê²½ìš°ëŠ” ë„˜ì–´ê°„ë‹¤.

public class GroupFindService {

    public Page<Group> findAll(GroupFindRequest request) {
        Pageable pageable = PageRequest.of(request.getPage(), DEFAULT_PAGE_SIZE);
				
        Specification.where(GroupSpecification.initialize());
        if (request.getCategory() != null) {
            Category category = Category.from(request.getCategory());
            specification = specification.and(GroupSpecification.filterByCategory(category));
        }
        if (request.getExcludeFinished() != null) {
            specification = specification.and(GroupSpecification.excludeFinishedRecruitment());
        }
        if (request.getKeyword() != null) {
            specification = specification.and(GroupSpecification.containKeyword(request.getKeyword()));
        }
        if (request.getOrderByDeadline() != null) {
            specification = specification.and(GroupSpecification.orderByDeadline());
        } else {
            specification = specification.and(GroupSpecification.orderByIdDesc());
        }

        return groupRepository.findAll(specification, pageable);
    }
    ...
}

ì¹´í…Œê³ ë¦¬+í‚¤ì›Œë“œì˜ ì¡°í•©ìœ¼ë¡œ /api/groups?category=1&keyword=ìŠ¤í„°ë”” ì˜ ìš”ì²­ì´ ì˜¨ ê²½ìš°ë¥¼ ì˜ˆì‹œë¡œ ë“¤ë©´ filterByCategory()ì™€ containKeyword() ê°€ and() ì—°ì‚°ì„ í†µí•´ ì—°ê²°ë˜ê²Œ ëœë‹¤. ì´ë ‡ê²Œ ë§Œë“¤ì–´ì§„ Specificationì„ findAll() ë©”ì„œë“œì— ì¸ìë¡œ ë„£ì–´ ì‹¤í–‰í•œ ê²°ê³¼ ì•„ë˜ì™€ ê°™ì´ ìš°ë¦¬ê°€ ì›í•˜ëŠ” ì¡°ê±´ì´ í¬í•¨ëœ ì¿¼ë¦¬ê°€ ì‹¤í–‰ë¨ì„ í™•ì¸í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆë‹¤.

4. ë¦¬í™í„°ë§

ë¦¬í™í„°ë§ ì´ì „ ì•ì˜ ì½”ë“œë¥¼ ë³´ë©´ Serviceë¡œì§ì—ì„œ ê°ê°ì˜ í•„ë“œì˜ nullì²´í¬ë¥¼ í•˜ê¸° ìœ„í•´ ifë¬¸ì„ ë„ë°°í•œ ì½”ë“œë¥¼ ë³¼ ìˆ˜ ìˆì—ˆë‹¤. ë„ë°°ëœ ifë¬¸ì„ ì—†ì• ê³  ì²´ì´ë‹ë°©ë²•ìœ¼ë¡œ ë¦¬í™í„°ë§ì„ í•œ ìµœì¢… ì½”ë“œëŠ” ì•„ë˜ì™€ ê°™ë‹¤.

ifë¬¸ì„ í†µí•œ null ì²´í¬ëŠ” ê°ê° Specification ìƒì„± ë¡œì§ì—ì„œ ë‹´ë‹¹í•˜ë„ë¡ í•˜ì—¬ Serviceë¡œì§ì€ andë¥¼ í†µí•œ ì²´ì´ë‹ ì½”ë“œë¡œ ë³€ê²½ëë‹¤.

EntityManagerì— ì—”í‹°í‹°ë¥¼ ì €ì¥í•˜ê±°ë‚˜ ë°ì´í„°ë¥¼ í†µí•´ ì¡°íšŒë¥¼ í•˜ë©´ EntityManagerëŠ” ì˜ì†ì„± ì»¨í…ìŠ¤íŠ¸ì— ì—”í‹°í‹°ë¥¼ ë³´ê´€í•˜ëŠ” ë“±ì˜ ê´€ë¦¬ë¥¼ í•˜ê²Œ ëœë‹¤. ì´ëŸ¬í•œ EntityManagerë“¤ì€ ì—¬ëŸ¬ ìŠ¤ë ˆë“œê°€ ë™ì‹œì— ì ‘ê·¼í•˜ë©´ ë™ì‹œì„± ë¬¸ì œê°€ ë°œìƒí•˜ë¯€ë¡œ ìŠ¤ë ˆë“œê°„ì— ì ˆëŒ€ë¡œ ê³µìœ ë¥¼ í•˜ë©´ ì•ˆëœë‹¤.

  • ë™ì‹œì„±(Concurrency): ì‚¬ìš©ìê°€ ì²´ê°í•˜ê¸°ì—ëŠ” ë™ì‹œì— ìˆ˜í–‰í•˜ëŠ” ê±°ì²˜ëŸ¼ ë³´ì´ì§€ë§Œ ì‚¬ì‹¤ ì‚¬ìš©ìê°€ ì²´ê°í•  ìˆ˜ ì—†ëŠ” ì§§ì€ ì‹œê°„ë‹¨ìœ„ë¡œ ì‘ì—…ë“¤ì„ ë²ˆê°ˆì•„ê°€ë©´ì„œ ìˆ˜í–‰ë˜ëŠ” ê²ƒì´ë‹¤. ex) ê° ìŠ¤ë ˆë“œë“¤ì´ ë™ì‹œì— ë™ì‘í•˜ëŠ” ê±° ê°™ì§€ë§Œ ì•Œê³  ë³´ë©´ ìŠ¤ë ˆë“œë“¤ì´ ì•„ì£¼ ì§§ì€ ì‹œê°„ë§ˆë‹¤ ë²ˆê°ˆì•„ê°€ë©´ì„œ ì‘ì—…ì„ ìˆ˜í–‰í•˜ê³  ìˆëŠ” ê²ƒì´ë‹¤.
  • ë³‘ë ¬(Parallelism): ìš°ë¦¬ê°€ ìƒê°í•˜ëŠ” ì§„ì§œ ë™ì‹œì— ì‹¤í–‰í•˜ëŠ” ê°œë…ì„ ìƒê°í•˜ë©´ ëœë‹¤. ì‹¤ì œë¡œ ë™ì‹œì— ê°ê°ì˜ ì‘ì—…ì„ í•˜ëŠ” ì—¬ëŸ¬ ìŠ¤ë ˆë“œë“¤ì´ ë™ì‹œì— ë™ì‘í•œë‹¤.

í•˜ë‚˜ì˜ ìŠ¤ë ˆë“œì—ì„œ ë°ì´í„°ë¥¼ ìˆ˜ì •í•˜ê³  ìˆëŠ”ë° ë‹¤ë¥¸ ìŠ¤ë ˆë“œì—ì„œ ë™ì¼í•œ EntityManagerë¥¼ í†µí•´ ë°ì´í„°ë¥¼ ìˆ˜ì •í•˜ëŠ” ë“±ì˜ ë¬¸ì œê°€ ë°œìƒí•˜ë©´ ì•ˆë˜ê¸°ì— EntityManagerëŠ” ê³µìœ ë˜ë©´ ì•ˆëœë‹¤. ê·¸ë¦¬ê³  ì´ëŸ¬í•œ EntityManagerë¥¼ ë§Œë“¤ì–´ì£¼ëŠ” ê²ƒì´ ë°”ë¡œ EntityFactoryì´ë‹¤.

ì• í”Œë¦¬ì¼€ì´ì…˜ì—ëŠ” í•˜ë‚˜ì˜Â EntityManagerFactoryê°€ ì¡´ì¬í•œë‹¤. ì´ëŠ” ë””ë¹„ì— ì ‘ê·¼í•˜ëŠ” íŠ¸ëœì­ì…˜ì´ ìƒê¸¸ ë•Œ ì“°ë ˆë“œ ë³„ë¡œÂ Entity Managerë¥¼ ìƒì„±í•˜ì—¬ ì˜ì†ì„± ì»¨í…ìŠ¤íŠ¸ì— ì ‘ê·¼í•˜ë„ë¡ í•´ì¤€ë‹¤.

(J2EEì™€ ê°™ì€ ìŠ¤í”„ë§ í”„ë ˆì„ì›Œí¬ ê°™ì€ ì»¨í…Œì´ë„ˆ í™˜ê²½ì€ Entity Managerì™€ ì˜ì†ì„± ì»¨í…ìŠ¤íŠ¸ì˜ ê´€ê³„ê°€ N:1ì´ ê°€ëŠ¥í•˜ë‹¤. í•˜ì§€ë§Œ J2SEì™€ ê°™ì€ í™˜ê²½ì€ 1:1ì´ë‹¤.)

ì¤€ì˜ì† ìƒíƒœì˜ íŠ¹ì§•

4.1. 1ì°¨ Cache

ì•„ë˜ì˜ ì½”ë“œì™€ ê°™ì´ dataë¥¼ idê°’ìœ¼ë¡œ ë°˜ë³µì ìœ¼ë¡œ ì°¾ê²Œ ë˜ì—ˆì„ ë•Œ @Transactionalì´ ë¶™ëŠ”ë‹¤ë©´ JPAëŠ” ë°ì´í„°ë¥¼ ì¡°íšŒí•˜ë©° cacheì— ì €ì¥ì„ í•œ í›„ ë‹¤ìŒ ì¡°íšŒë•ŒëŠ” ê°™ì€ ì¡°íšŒë¥¼ í•˜ì§€ ì•Šê³  cacheì— ìˆëŠ” ê°’ì„ ë‚´ë³´ë‚¸ë‹¤.

    @Test

4.2. ì ìš©í•˜ê¸°

ğŸ“ŒÂ ìš°ë¦¬ëŠ” ArgumentResolverë¥¼ êµ¬í˜„í•˜ê³  ì‹¤í–‰ë˜ê¸°ë¥¼ ì›í•˜ëŠ” Parameterì•ì— ì–´ë…¸í…Œì´ì…˜ì„ ë¶™ì—¬ì£¼ë©´ ArgumentResolverê°€ ì ìš©ëœë‹¤.

import java.lang.annotation.ElementType;
import java.lang.annotation.Retention;
import java.lang.annotation.RetentionPolicy;
import java.lang.annotation.Target;

@Target(ElementType.PARAMETER)
@Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)
public @interface AuthenticationPrincipal {
}
public class AuthenticationPrincipalArgumentResolver implements HandlerMethodArgumentResolver {

    private final AuthService authService;

    public AuthenticationPrincipalArgumentResolver(AuthService authService) {
        this.authService = authService;
    }

    @Override
    public boolean supportsParameter(MethodParameter parameter) {
        return parameter.hasParameterAnnotation(AuthenticationPrincipal.class);
    }

    @Override
    public Long resolveArgument(MethodParameter parameter, ModelAndViewContainer mavContainer, NativeWebRequest webRequest, WebDataBinderFactory binderFactory) {
        HttpServletRequest request = webRequest.getNativeRequest(HttpServletRequest.class);
        return authService.extractIdFromRequest(request);
    }
}

ìŠ¤í”„ë§ì—ì„œ ê³µí†µ ê¸°ëŠ¥ì„ ì œê±°í•˜ëŠ” ëŒ€í‘œì ì¸ ë°©ë²•ìœ¼ë¡œëŠ” Filter, Interceptor, AOPê°€ ìˆë‹¤. ì´ì „ í¬ìŠ¤íŠ¸ì¸ Filterë€ ë¬´ì—‡ì¸ê°€? ì— ì´ì–´ì„œ ì´ë²ˆ í¬ìŠ¤íŠ¸ì—ì„œëŠ” ê³µí†µ ê¸°ëŠ¥ ì œê±° ë°©ë²• ì¤‘ Interceptorì— ëŒ€í•´ ì•Œì•„ë³¼ ê²ƒì´ë‹¤.

Dispatcher Servletì€ HandlerMappingì„ í†µí•´ ìš”ì²­ì— ë§ëŠ” ì»¨íŠ¸ë¡¤ëŸ¬ë¥¼ ì°¾ë„ë¡ í•´ì£¼ë©´ ê²°ê³¼ë¡œ HandlerExecutionChainì„ ë°˜í™˜í•´ì¤€ë‹¤. ì´ë•Œ HandlerExecutionChain ì•ˆì— 1ê°œ ì´ìƒì˜ ë“±ë¡ë˜ì–´ìˆëŠ” Interceptorê°€ ìˆë‹¤ë©´ ìˆœì°¨ì ìœ¼ë¡œ Interceptorë¥¼ ê±°ì¹˜ê²Œë˜ë©° ê·¸ í›„ì— HandlerAdapterê°€ handler(controller)ë¥¼ ì‹¤í–‰í•œë‹¤. ë§Œì•½ Interceptorê°€ ì—†ìœ¼ë©´ ì»¨íŠ¸ë¡¤ëŸ¬ê°€ ë°”ë¡œ ì‹¤í–‰ëœë‹¤.

2. Interceptorì˜ ë©”ì„œë“œ

package org.springframework.web.servlet;

import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse;

import org.springframework.lang.Nullable;
import org.springframework.web.method.HandlerMethod;

public interface HandlerInterceptor {

    default boolean preHandle(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response, Object handler)
        throws Exception {

        return true;
    }

    default void postHandle(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response, Object handler,
        @Nullable ModelAndView modelAndView) throws Exception {
    }

    default void afterCompletion(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response, Object handler,
        @Nullable Exception ex) throws Exception {
    }
}

  • preHandle(): ì»¨íŠ¸ë¡¤ëŸ¬ í˜¸ì¶œ ì „ì— ì‹¤í–‰ë˜ëŠ” ë©”ì„œë“œë¡œ ìš”ì²­ ì •ë³´ë¥¼ ê°€ê³µí•˜ê±°ë‚˜ ì¶”ê°€í•˜ëŠ” ì „ì²˜ë¦¬ ì‘ì—…ì„ ìœ„í•´ ì‚¬ìš©í•œë‹¤. ë°˜í™˜ íƒ€ì…ì´ booleaní˜•ì¸ ê²ƒì„ í™•ì¸í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆëŠ”ë°, trueë¥¼ ë°˜í™˜í•˜ê²Œ ëœë‹¤ë©´ ë‹¤ìŒ Interceptorë¥¼ ì‹¤í–‰í•˜ê²Œ ë˜ê³ , falseë©´ ì‘ì—…ì„ ì¤‘ë‹¨í•˜ê³  ì´í›„ì˜ Interceptorì™€ ì»¨íŠ¸ë¡¤ëŸ¬ë¥¼ ì‹¤í–‰í•˜ì§€ ì•ŠëŠ”ë‹¤.

  • postHandle(): ì»¨íŠ¸ë¡¤ëŸ¬ ì‹¤í–‰ í›„ Viewê°€ ìƒì„±ë˜ê¸° ì´ì „ì— ì‹¤í–‰ë˜ëŠ” ë©”ì„œë“œë¡œ í›„ì²˜ë¦¬ ì‘ì—…ì— ì‚¬ìš©ì„ í•œë‹¤. ë³´í†µì€ ModelAndView íƒ€ì…ì˜ ì •ë³´ê°€ ì œê³µë˜ì–´ ì´ë¥¼ í›„ì²˜ë¦¬í•˜ê¸° ìœ„í•´ ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ì˜€ëŠ”ë°, ìµœê·¼ì—ëŠ” RestAPI ë“¤ì„ ë§Œë“¤ë©° ìì£¼ ì‚¬ìš©ë˜ì§€ ì•ŠëŠ”ë‹¤.
  • afterCompletion() : View ì²˜ë¦¬ë¥¼ í¬í•¨í•œ ëª¨ë“  ì‘ì—…ì´ ì™„ë£Œëœ í›„ì— ì‹¤í–‰ëœë‹¤.

3. Interceptor ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ê¸°

ì•ì„œ ë§í•œë°”ì™€ ê°™ì´ Interceptorë¥¼ êµ¬í˜„í•˜ë ¤ë©´ ë¨¼ì € HandlerInterceptorë¥¼ êµ¬í˜„í•œ í´ë˜ìŠ¤ë¥¼ ì‘ì„±í•´ì•¼í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤.

ì‚¬ìš© ì˜ˆì‹œë¥¼ ì‘ì„±í•˜ê¸° ìœ„í•´ ìš°ì•„í•œí…Œí¬ì½”ìŠ¤-ì¥ë°”êµ¬ë‹ˆ ë¯¸ì…˜ ì½”ë“œì˜ ì¼ë¶€ë¥¼ ìˆ˜ì •í•˜ì—¬ ì‘ì„±í•´ë´¤ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.

3.1. Interceptor ë§Œë“¤ê¸°

ì•„ë˜ì˜ ì½”ë“œëŠ” ì›¹ ì„œë¹„ìŠ¤ì—ì„œ ë¡œê·¸ì¸ì´ ëœ ì´í›„ì— ê°€ëŠ¥í•œ ì„œë¹„ìŠ¤ë“¤ì— ëŒ€í•´ í† í° ê°’ì´ ìœ íš¨í•œì§€ í™•ì¸ì„ í•´ì£¼ëŠ” ì¸í„°ì…‰í„° ì½”ë“œì…ë‹ˆë‹¤.

@Slf4j
public class TokenInterceptor implements HandlerInterceptor {

    private final AuthService authService;

    public TokenInterceptor(AuthService authService) {
        this.authService = authService;
    }

    @Override
    public boolean preHandle(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response, Object handler) {
        log.info("======= TokenInterceptor ì‹¤í–‰ =======");

        return false;
    }
}

ì½”ë“œë¥¼ ë³´ë©´ í•´ë‹¹ ì¸í„°ì…‰í„°ëŠ” HandlerInterceptorì¸í„°í˜ì´ìŠ¤ë¥¼ êµ¬í˜„í•˜ì˜€ìœ¼ë©° preHandleë©”ì„œë“œë¥¼ ì¬ì •ì˜í•˜ë©° ì»¨íŠ¸ë¡¤ëŸ¬ë¡œ ê°€ê¸° ì „ì— ìš”ì²­ì˜ token ê°’ì´ ìœ íš¨í•œì§€ ê²€ì‚¬ë¥¼ í•˜ê³  ìˆëŠ” ê²ƒì„ ì•Œ ìˆ˜ ìˆë‹¤.

í…ŒìŠ¤íŠ¸ë¥¼ ìœ„í•´ @Slf4jë¥¼ í†µí•´ ë¡œê·¸ë¥¼ ë‚¨ê²¼ë‹¤.

3.2. Interceptor ë“±ë¡í•˜ê¸°

@Configuration
public class AuthenticationPrincipalConfig implements WebMvcConfigurer {

    private final AuthService authService;

    public AuthenticationPrincipalConfig(AuthService authService) {

    }

    @Override
    public void addInterceptors(InterceptorRegistry registry) {

                .addPathPatterns("/api/members/me/**");

}

Interceptorì˜ ë“±ë¡ì€ addInterceptors()ë©”ì„œë“œì˜ ë§¤ê°œë³€ìˆ˜ë¡œ ìˆëŠ” InterceptorRegistryì— addInterceptor()ë©”ì„œë“œë¥¼ í†µí•´ ì¶”ê°€ë¥¼ í•´ì£¼ë©´ ëœë‹¤.

Interceptorë“±ë¡ ë° ì„¤ì •ì— ëŒ€í•œ ë©”ì„œë“œë“¤ì€ InterceptorRegistrationí´ë˜ìŠ¤ì—ì„œ ì œê³µì„ í•˜ê³  ìˆë‹¤. í•´ë‹¹ í´ë˜ìŠ¤ì—ì„œ ì œê³µí•˜ëŠ” ë©”ì„œë“œë“¤ì€ ë‹¤ìŒê³¼ ê°™ë‹¤.

3.2.1. Interceptor ì¶”ê°€ ì„¤ì • ë©”ì„œë“œ

  • excludePathPatterns(): ì‹¤í–‰ì„ ì œì™¸í•˜ê³  ì‹¶ì€ Url íŒ¨í„´ì„ ì„¤ì •í•œë‹¤.
  • pathMatcher(): ì¸í„°ì…‰í„°ê°€ ì‹¤í–‰ë˜ê±°ë‚˜ ì œì™¸í•  Url íŒ¨í„´ì„ ì„¤ì •í•œ PathMatcherë¥¼ ì¸ìë¡œ ì£¼ì–´ ì‹¤í–‰ë  Url íŒ¨í„´ì„ ì„¤ì •í•œë‹¤.
  • order(): ì¸í„°ì…‰í„°ì˜ ì‹¤í–‰ ìˆœì„œë¥¼ ì •í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆë‹¤.

3.3. ì‹¤í–‰ ê²°ê³¼ í™•ì¸

import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test;

import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
import org.springframework.boot.test.autoconfigure.web.servlet.AutoConfigureMockMvc;
import org.springframework.boot.test.context.SpringBootTest;
import org.springframework.test.web.reactive.server.WebTestClient;
import org.springframework.test.web.servlet.MockMvc;

import static org.springframework.test.web.servlet.request.MockMvcRequestBuilders.get;
import static org.springframework.test.web.servlet.result.MockMvcResultMatchers.content;
import static org.springframework.test.web.servlet.result.MockMvcResultMatchers.status;

@SpringBootTest
@AutoConfigureMockMvc
class MyMockMvcTests {

    @Test
    void testWithMockMvc(@Autowired MockMvc mvc) throws Exception {
        mvc.perform(get("/")).andExpect(status().isOk()).andExpect(content().string("Hello World"));
    }

    // If Spring WebFlux is on the classpath, you can drive MVC tests with a WebTestClient
    @Test
    void testWithWebTestClient(@Autowired WebTestClient webClient) {
        webClient
                .get().uri("/")
                .exchange()
                .expectStatus().isOk()
                .expectBody(String.class).isEqualTo("Hello World");
    }

}

@RestControllerAdvice
public class GlobalControllerAdvice {

    @ExceptionHandler(MethodArgumentNotValidException.class)
    public ResponseEntity<ErrorResponse> handleMethodArgumentNotValidException(MethodArgumentNotValidException e) {
        StringBuilder message = new StringBuilder();

        for (FieldError error : e.getFieldErrors()) {
            message.append(error.getDefaultMessage()).append(" ");

        return ResponseEntity.badRequest().body(new ErrorResponse(message.toString()));
    }
}

Errors ë˜ëŠ” BindingResultë¥¼ ë§¤ê°œë³€ìˆ˜ë¡œ ë‘ë©´ ë”°ë¡œ ì˜ˆì™¸ê°€ ë°œìƒí•˜ì§€ ì•ŠëŠ”ë‹¤. í•´ë‹¹ íŒŒë¼ë¯¸í„°ì— ì—ëŸ¬ ë‚´ìš©ì´ ë‹´ê¸°ê²Œ ëœë‹¤. ìš°ë¦¬ëŠ” getAllErrors(), hasErrors()ì™€ ê°™ì€ ë©”ì„œë“œë¥¼ í†µí•´ ì˜ˆì™¸ì— ë”°ë¥¸ Responseë¥¼ ë§Œë“¤ ìˆ˜ ìˆë‹¤.

@RestController
public class MemberController {

    @PostMapping("/user")
    public ResponseEntity user(@Valid @RequestBody User user, BindingResult bindingResult){

        if(bindingResult.hasErrors()){
            StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
            bindingResult.getAllErrors().forEach(objectError -> {
                FieldError field = (FieldError) objectError;
                String message = objectError.getDefaultMessage();

                System.out.println("Field : "+ field.getField());
                System.out.println(message);

                sb.append("Field : "+ field.getField());
                sb.append("message: "+message);
                sb.append("\\n\\n");
            });
            return ResponseEntity.status(HttpStatus.BAD_REQUEST).body(sb.toString());
        }

        return ResponseEntity.ok(user);
    }

4. Bean Scope

4.1. Singleton Scope

For access to an existing attribute in the model (instantiated if not present) with data binding and validation applied. SeeÂ [@ModelAttribute](https://docs.spring.io/spring-framework/docs/current/reference/html/web.html#mvc-ann-modelattrib-method-args)Â as well asÂ ModelÂ andÂ [DataBinder](https://docs.spring.io/spring-framework/docs/current/reference/html/web.html#mvc-ann-initbinder).

You can use theÂ @ModelAttributeÂ annotation on a method argument to access an attribute from the model or have it be instantiated if not present. The model attribute is also overlain with values from HTTP Servlet request parameters whose names match to field names. This is referred to as data binding, and it saves you from having to deal with parsing and converting individual query parameters and form fields.

item.content:encoded:
ì´ ê¸€ì€ Effective Java 3/Eì˜ ë‚´ìš©ì„ ìš”ì•½í•œ ê¸€ì…ë‹ˆë‹¤. ìì„¸í•œ ë‚´ìš©ì€ ì±…ì„ ì°¸ê³ í•˜ì‹œê¸° ë°”ëë‹ˆë‹¤.

ìë°”ì—ì„œëŠ” ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ì§€ ì•ŠëŠ” ê°ì²´ì˜ ê²½ìš° GC(Garbage Collection)ì—ì„œ ì•Œì•„ì„œ íšŒìˆ˜ë¥¼ í•´ì£¼ë©° ë©”ëª¨ë¦¬ ê´€ë¦¬ë¥¼ í•´ì¤ë‹ˆë‹¤. í•˜ì§€ë§Œ GCê°€ ë©”ëª¨ë¦¬ ê´€ë¦¬ë¥¼ í•´ì¤€ë‹¤ê³ í•´ì„œ ìš°ë¦¬ê°€ ì™„ì „íˆ ì‹ ê²½ì„ ì“°ì§€ ì•Šì•„ë„ ë˜ëŠ”ê±´ ì•„ë‹™ë‹ˆë‹¤. ê°€ë¹„ì§€ ì»¬ë ‰ì…˜ì—ì„œëŠ” íŠ¹ì • ìƒí™©ì—ì„œ ë©”ëª¨ë¦¬ ëˆ„ìˆ˜ê°€ ë°œìƒí•˜ê³ , ìš°ë¦¬ëŠ” ê·¸ëŸ¬í•œ ìƒí™©ì„ ì¸ì§€í•˜ê³  ëŒ€ì‘í•´ì¤˜ì•¼í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤.

ë©”ëª¨ë¦¬ ëˆ„ìˆ˜ëŠ” ì–¸ì œ ë°œìƒí• ê¹Œ?

public class Stack {
    private Object[] elements;
    private int size = 0;
    private static final int DEFAULT_CAPACITY = 16;

    public Stack() {
        elements = new Object[DEFAULT_CAPACITY];
    }

    public void push(Object e) {
        ensureCapacity();
        elements[size++] = e;
    }

    public Object pop() {
        if (size == 0) throw new EmptyStackException();
        return elements[--size];
    }

    private void ensureCapacity() { // ì›ì†Œë“¤ì´ ë“¤ì–´ê°ˆ ê³µê°„ í™•ë³´
        if (elements.length == size)
            elements = Arrays.copyOf(elements, 2 * size + 1);
    }
}

public boolean equals(Object obj){

}

equals() ì¬ì •ì˜ ì˜ˆì‹œëŠ” ë‹¤ìŒê³¼ ê°™ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.

public class Coffee {
  private String name;
  private int price;

  public Coffee(String name, int price) {
    this.name = name;
    this.price = price;
  }

  @Override
  public boolean equals(Object o) {
    if (this == o) return true;
    if (o == null || getClass() != o.getClass()) return false;
    Coffee coffee = (Coffee) o;
    return price == coffee.price && Objects.equals(name, coffee.name);
  }

  @Override
  public int hashCode() {
    return Objects.hash(name, price);
  }
}

public static void main(String[] args) {
    Coffee coffee1 = new Coffee("americano", 4500);
    Coffee coffee2 = new Coffee("americano", 4500);

    System.out.println(coffee1.equals(coffee2));
}

public class HealthInformaiton {

ì ì¦ì  ìƒì„±ì íŒ¨í„´ì„ ì‚¬ìš©í•œ í´ë˜ìŠ¤ì˜ ì¸ìŠ¤í„´ìŠ¤ë¥¼ ë§Œë“¤ë ¤ë©´ ì›í•˜ëŠ” ë§¤ê°œë³€ìˆ˜ë¥¼ í¬í•¨í•œ ìƒì„±ì ì¤‘ì—ì„œ ê°€ì¥ ì§§ì€ ê²ƒì„ ê³¨ë¼ì„œ í˜¸ì¶œí•´ì£¼ë©´ ë©ë‹ˆë‹¤.

ì ì¦ì  ìƒì„±ì íŒ¨í„´ì€ ì—¬ê¸°ì„œ ë‹¨ì ì´ ë‚˜ì˜¤ê²Œ ë©ë‹ˆë‹¤. ì•ì„œ ë§í•œ ì˜ˆì‹œëŠ” 4ê°œì˜ ë§¤ê°œë³€ìˆ˜ ì¤‘ 1ê°œì˜ ê°’ë§Œì„ 0ìœ¼ë¡œ ì˜ë¯¸ì—†ëŠ” ì´ˆê¸°í™”ê°’ì„ ë„£ì–´ì¤¬ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. ì˜ˆì‹œ ì½”ë“œë¡œ ë´¤ì„ë–„ëŠ” ë³„ ë¬¸ì œê°€ ì—†ì–´ë³´ì´ì§€ë§Œ ë§Œì•½ ê±´ê°•ì •ë³´ ê°ì²´ì— ë” ë§ì€ ì¸ìŠ¤í„´ìŠ¤ ë³€ìˆ˜ê°€ ìƒê²¨ ìƒì„±ìì˜ ë§¤ê°œë³€ìˆ˜ê°€ ìˆ˜ì—†ì´ ë§ì•„ì§€ê²Œ ëœë‹¤ë©´ í´ë¼ì´ì–¸íŠ¸ ì½”ë“œë¥¼ ì‘ì„±í•˜ê±°ë‚˜ ì½ê¸° ì–´ë ¤ì›Œì§‘ë‹ˆë‹¤. ì´ëŸ¬í•œ ë¬¸ì œëŠ” ì°¾ê¸° ì–´ë ¤ìš´ ë²„ê·¸ë¡œ ì´ì–´ì§ˆ ìˆ˜ë„ ìˆê³  ì»´íŒŒì¼ëŸ¬ë„ ì°¾ì§€ ëª»í•˜ëŠ” ì˜¤ë¥˜ë¥¼ ë°œìƒì‹œì¼œ ëŸ°íƒ€ì„ì— ì´ìƒí•œ ë™ì‘ì„ ì°¾ê²Œë˜ëŠ” ìƒí™©ì´ ë°œìƒí•  ìˆ˜ ìˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.

ë‹¨ì  ì •ë¦¬
ì ì¸µì  ìƒì„±ì íŒ¨í„´ì€ ìƒì„±ìì— ë§ì€ íŒŒë¼ë¯¸í„°ê°€ ë“¤ì–´ê°€ì„œ íŒŒë¼ë¯¸í„° ìˆœì„œê°€ í‹€ë¦´ ìˆ˜ ìˆê³ , ê°ê° ë§¤ê°œë³€ìˆ˜ê°€ ë¬´ì—‡ì„ ì˜ë¯¸í•˜ëŠ”ì§€ ìƒì„±ìë¥¼ ì—´ì–´ë³´ê¸° ì „ì—ëŠ” ì•Œê¸° ì–´ë µë‹¤ëŠ” ë‹¨ì ì´ ìˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.

ìë°”ë¹ˆì¦ˆ íŒ¨í„´ (JavaBeans pattern)

ìë°”ë¹ˆì¦ˆ íŒ¨í„´ì€ ë§¤ê°œë³€ìˆ˜ê°€ ì—†ëŠ” ìƒì„±ìë¡œ ê°ì²´ë¥¼ ë§Œë“  í›„ Setterë©”ì„œë“œë¥¼ í˜¸ì¶œí•´ ì›í•˜ëŠ” ë§¤ê°œë³€ìˆ˜ì˜ ê°’ì„ ì„¤ì •í•˜ëŠ” ë°©ì‹ì…ë‹ˆë‹¤.

Setterë§¤ì„œë“œë¥¼ í™œìš©í•œë‹¤ë¼...ë²Œì¨ë¶€í„° ì¢‹ì§€ ì•Šì€ ë°©ë²•ì´ë¼ëŠ” ê²ƒì„ ì•Œ ìˆ˜ ìˆê² êµ°ìš” ğŸ¤“

public class HealthInformaiton {
    // ë§¤ê°œë³€ìˆ˜ë“¤ì€ ê¸°ë³¸ê°’ìœ¼ë¡œ ì´ˆê¸°í™”í•œë‹¤.
    private String name; // í™˜ìì´ë¦„ (í•„ìˆ˜)
    private String phoneNumber; // ì „í™”ë²ˆí˜¸ (í•„ìˆ˜)

    private float weight = 0; // ëª¸ë¬´ê²Œ

    public HealthInformaiton() {}

public class HealthInformaiton {

        // í•„ìˆ˜ ë§¤ê°œë³€ìˆ˜
        private final String name; // í™˜ìì´ë¦„

        public Builder(String name, String phoneNumber) {

// BigInteger.java

public BigInteger(int bitLength, int certainty, Random rnd) {
    BigInteger prime;

    if (bitLength < 2)
    throw new ArithmeticException("bitLength < 2");
    prime = (bitLength < SMALL_PRIME_THRESHOLD
            ? smallPrime(bitLength, certainty, rnd)
            : largePrime(bitLength, certainty, rnd));
    signum = 1;
    mag = prime.mag;
}

public static BigInteger probablePrime(int bitLength, Random rnd) {
    if (bitLength < 2)
        throw new ArithmeticException("bitLength < 2");

    return (bitLength < SMALL_PRIME_THRESHOLD ?
            smallPrime(bitLength, DEFAULT_PRIME_CERTAINTY, rnd) :
            largePrime(bitLength, DEFAULT_PRIME_CERTAINTY, rnd));
}

ë§Œì•½ í•˜ë‚˜ì˜ ì‹œê·¸ë‹ˆì²˜ë¡œ ë§¤ê°œë³€ìˆ˜ì˜ ìˆœì„œë¥¼ ë‹¤ë¥´ê²Œ ìƒì„±ìë¥¼ ì¶”ê°€í•˜ê³  ì‚¬ìš©í•  ê²½ìš° ê°œë°œìë“¤ì´ APIë¥¼ ì˜ëª» í˜¸ì¶œí•˜ëŠ” ì‹¤ìˆ˜ë¥¼ ìœ ë°œí•  ìˆ˜ë„ ìˆë‹¤.ğŸ¤¯

ë‘ë²ˆì¨° ì¥ì  ë•ë¶„ì— ë¶ˆë³€ í´ë˜ìŠ¤(Immutable class)ëŠ” ì¸ìŠ¤í„´ìŠ¤ë¥¼ ë¯¸ë¦¬ ë§Œë“¤ì–´ ë†“ê±°ë‚˜ ìƒˆë¡œ ìƒì„±í•œ ì¸ìŠ¤í„´ìŠ¤ë¥¼ ìºì‹±í•˜ì—¬ ì¬í™œìš©í•˜ëŠ” ì‹ìœ¼ë¡œ ê°ì²´ì˜ ìƒì„±ì„ í”¼í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.

public final class Boolean implements java.io.Serializable,Comparable<Boolean> {

    public static final Boolean TRUE = new Boolean(true);

    public static final Boolean FALSE = new Boolean(false);

    public static Boolean valueOf(boolean b) {
        return (b ? TRUE : FALSE);

public abstract class EnumSet<E extends Enum<E>> extends AbstractSet<E>
    implements Cloneable, java.io.Serializable {

    ...
    public static <E extends Enum<E>> EnumSet<E> noneOf(Class<E> elementType) {
        Enum<?>[] universe = getUniverse(elementType);
        if (universe == null)
            throw new ClassCastException(elementType + " not an enum");

        if (universe.length <= 64)
            return new RegularEnumSet<>(elementType, universe);
        else
            return new JumboEnumSet<>(elementType, universe);
    }
    ...
}

public class StringCalculator {
    private static final int NUMBERS = 2;
    private static final int CUSTOM_DISTRIBUTOR = 1;

    public static int splitAndSum(String input) {
        if (checkNullOrEmpty(input)) {
            return 0;
        }
        Matcher matcher = Pattern.compile(CUSTOM_DISTRIBUTOR_PATTERN).matcher(input);
        if (matcher.find()) {
            checkInvalidInput(matcher.group(NUMBERS), matcher.group(CUSTOM_DISTRIBUTOR));
            return getSum(matcher.group(NUMBERS), matcher.group(CUSTOM_DISTRIBUTOR));
        }
    }
}

public enum Course {

    FRONTEND("í”„ë¡ íŠ¸ì—”ë“œ");

    private String name;

    Course(String name) {

    }

    public String getName() {
        return name;
    }

    public static List<String> getList() {
        return Arrays.stream(Course.values())
                .map(Course::getName)
                .sequential()
                .collect(Collectors.toList());
    }

    public static boolean isExist(String name) {
        List<Course> result = Arrays.stream(Course.values())
                .filter(course -> course.getName().equals(name))
                .collect(Collectors.toList());
        if (result.size() == 1) {
            return true;
        }
        return false;
    }

    public static Course getEnumCourse(String name) {
        return Arrays.stream(Course.values())
                .filter(course -> course.getName().equals(name))
                .collect(Collectors.toList()).get(0);
    }
}

    public static List<Integer> getAvailableCoinValueList(int remainMoney) {
        List<Integer> coinValueList = new ArrayList<>();

    public static List<Integer> getAvailableCoinValueList(int remainMoney) {

    public static List<Integer> getAvailableCoinValueList(int remainMoney) {
        List<Integer> coinValueList = new ArrayList<>();
        for (Coin c : Coin.values()) {
            if (c.getAmount() <= remainMoney) {
                continue;
            }
            coinValueList.add(c.getAmount());
        }
        return coinValueList;
    }

streamì„ ì ìš©í•œ ì½”ë“œëŠ” ë‹¤ìŒê³¼ ê°™ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. ì½”ë“œì— streamì„ ì ìš©í•´ë³´ë‹ˆ í™•ì‹¤íˆ ì½”ë“œì˜ ê¸¸ì´ê°€ ê°„ê²°í•´ì¡Œê³  streamì„ ì•Œê³  ìˆë‹¤ëŠ” ê°€ì •í•˜ì—ì„œëŠ” ì½”ë“œì˜ ê°€ë…ì„±ë„ ë†’ì•„ì§„ ê²ƒ ê°™ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.

    public static List<Integer> getAvailableCoinValueList(int remainMoney) {
        return Arrays.stream(Coin.values())
                .filter(coin -> coin.getAmount() <= remainMoney)
                .map(Coin::getAmount)
                .sequential()
                .collect(Collectors.toList());
    }

public enum Coin {

    COIN_100(100),

    Coin(final int amount) {

    public static List<Coin> getCoinList() {
        return Arrays.stream(Coin.values())
                .sequential()
                .collect(Collectors.toList());
    }

    public static List<Integer> getCoinValueList() {
        return Arrays.stream(Coin.values())
                .map(Coin::getAmount)
                .sequential()
                .collect(Collectors.toList());
    }

    public static List<Integer> getAvailableCoinValueList(int remainMoney) {
        return Arrays.stream(Coin.values())
                .filter(coin -> coin.getAmount() <= remainMoney)
                .map(Coin::getAmount)
                .sequential()
                .collect(Collectors.toList());
    }

    public int getAmount() {

    }
}

    private static ArrayList<String> findWinnerList(List<Car> carList) {
        HashMap<Integer, ArrayList<String>> rankMap = new HashMap<>();
        int maxPosition = INITIAL_VALUE;

        for (Car car : carList) {
            int carPosition = car.getPosition();
            maxPosition = Math.max(maxPosition, carPosition);

            if (!rankMap.containsKey(carPosition)) {
                rankMap.put(carPosition, new ArrayList<>());
            }
            rankMap.get(carPosition).add(car.getName());
        }
        return rankMap.get(maxPosition);
    }

    public static void printFinalResult(List<Car> carList) {
        HashMap<Integer, ArrayList<String>> rankMap = new HashMap<>();
        int maxPosition = 0;
        for (Car car : carList) {
            int carPosition = car.getPosition();

            if (maxPosition < carPosition) {
                maxPosition = carPosition;
            }

            if (!rankMap.containsKey(carPosition)) {
                rankMap.put(carPosition, new ArrayList<>());
            }
            rankMap.get(carPosition).add(car.getName());
        }

        List<String> winnerList = rankMap.get(maxPosition);

        System.out.print("ìµœì¢… ìš°ìŠ¹ì : ");
        int winnerListSize = winnerList.size();
        for (int i=0; i< winnerListSize-1; i++) {
            System.out.print(winnerList.get(i) + ", ");
        }
        System.out.println(winnerList.get(winnerListSize-1));

    }

ë©”ì„œë“œ ë¶„ë¦¬ í›„

    public static void printFinalResult(List<Car> carList) {
        List<String> winnerList = findWinnerList(carList);

        System.out.print("ìµœì¢… ìš°ìŠ¹ì : ");
        int winnerListSize = winnerList.size();
        for (int i=0; i< winnerListSize-1; i++) {
            System.out.print(winnerList.get(i) + ", ");
        }
        System.out.println(winnerList.get(winnerListSize-1));
    }

    private static ArrayList<String> findWinnerList(List<Car> carList) {
        HashMap<Integer, ArrayList<String>> rankMap = new HashMap<>();
        int maxPosition = 0;
        for (Car car : carList) {
            int carPosition = car.getPosition();
            maxPosition = Math.max(maxPosition, carPosition);

            if (!rankMap.containsKey(carPosition)) {
                rankMap.put(carPosition, new ArrayList<>());
            }
            rankMap.get(carPosition).add(car.getName());
        }
        return rankMap.get(maxPosition);
    }

public class InputUtils {
    public static List<Car> returnCarList() {
        List<Car> carList = new ArrayList<>();
        boolean isValid = false;

        while (!isValid) {
            try {
                System.out.println(CAR_NAME_INPUT_MESSAGE);
                carList = getCarList();
                isValid = true;
            } catch (IllegalArgumentException e) {
            }
        }
        return carList;
    }

    private static List<Car> getCarList() {
        List<Car> carList = new ArrayList<>();
        HashSet<String> carSet = new HashSet<>();
        String input = Console.readLine();
        checkCarNameSentence(input);
        String[] carArr = input.split(CAR_NAME_SEPARATOR);

        for (String carName : carArr) {
            checkCarNameWord(carName, carSet);
            carList.add(new Car(carName));
            carSet.add(carName);
        }
        return carList;
    }

import org.junit.jupiter.api.DisplayName;
import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test;

import java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException;
import java.lang.reflect.Method;

import static constant.Constant.*;
import static org.assertj.core.api.Assertions.assertThat;

class InputUtilsTest {
    @DisplayName("[ìë™ì°¨ ì´ë¦„] 5ìë¦¬ ì´ìƒì˜ ì´ë¦„ì¸ ê²½ìš°")
    @Test
    public void checkCarNameLengthTest() throws NoSuchMethodException {
        InputUtils inputUtils = new InputUtils();
        Method method = inputUtils.getClass().getDeclaredMethod("checkCarNameLength", String.class);
        method.setAccessible(true);

        try {
            method.invoke(inputUtils, "christopher");
        } catch (IllegalAccessException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        } catch (InvocationTargetException e) {
            assertThat(e.getCause().getMessage()).isEqualTo(ERROR_CAR_NAME_LENGTH);
        }
    }
}

BREAKING CHANGE: isolate scope bindings definition has changed and
    the inject option for the directive controller injection was removed.

    To migrate the code follow the example below:

    Before:

    scope: {
      myAttr: 'attribute',
      myBind: 'bind',
      myExpression: 'expression',
      myEval: 'evaluate',
      myAccessor: 'accessor'
    }

    After:

    scope: {
      myAttr: '@',
      myBind: '@',
      myExpression: '&',
      // myEval - usually not useful, but in cases where the expression is assignable, you can use '='
      myAccessor: '=' // in directive's template change myAccessor() to myAccessor
    }

    The removed `inject` wasn't generaly useful for directives so there should be no code using it.

Referencing Issues (í•´ê²°ëœ ì´ìŠˆ?)

í•´ê²°ë˜ ì´ìŠˆëŠ” ì»¤ë°‹ ë©”ì‹œì§€ í•˜ë‹¨ì— Closes #<ì´ìŠˆë²ˆí˜¸>ì™€ í•¨ê»˜ ê¸°ë¡í•´ì•¼í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤.

ì´ìŠˆê°€ í•˜ë‚˜ì¸ ê²½ìš°
Closes #234

ì´ìŠˆê°€ ì—¬ëŸ¬ê°œì¸ ê²½ìš°
Closes #123, #245, #992

ì˜ˆì‹œë“¤

  • Installing a new dependency
-> **build: Install new dependency**
  • Restructuring folder structure -> refactor: Reorganize folder layout
  • Updating/Changing stylesheets -> style: Update style sheets
  • Changing the name of an existing component -> refactor: Rename component
feat($browser): onUrlChange event (popstate/hashchange/polling)

Added new event to $browser:
- forward popstate event if available
- forward hashchange event if popstate not available
- do polling when neither popstate nor hashchange available

Breaks $browser.onHashChange, which was removed (use onUrlChange instead)
fix($compile): couple of unit tests for IE9

Older IEs serialize html uppercased, but IE9 does not...
Would be better to expect case insensitive, unfortunately jasmine does
not allow to user regexps for throw expectations.

Closes #392
Breaks foo.bar api, foo.baz should be used instead
feat(directive): ng:disabled, ng:checked, ng:multiple, ng:readonly, ng:selected

New directives for proper binding these attributes in older browsers (IE).
Added coresponding description, live examples and e2e tests.

Closes #351
style($location): add couple of missing semi colons
docs(guide): updated fixed docs from Google Docs

Couple of typos fixed:
- indentation
- batchLogbatchLog -> batchLog
- start periodic checking
- missing brace
feat($compile): simplify isolate scope bindings

Changed the isolate scope binding options to:
  - @attr - attribute binding (including interpolation)
  - =model - by-directional model binding
  - &expr - expression execution binding

This change simplifies the terminology as well as
number of choices available to the developer. It
also supports local name aliasing from the parent.

BREAKING CHANGE: isolate scope bindings definition has changed and
the inject option for the directive controller injection was removed.

To migrate the code follow the example below:

Before:

scope: {
  myAttr: 'attribute',
  myBind: 'bind',
  myExpression: 'expression',
  myEval: 'evaluate',
  myAccessor: 'accessor'
}

After:

scope: {
  myAttr: '@',
  myBind: '@',
  myExpression: '&',
  // myEval - usually not useful, but in cases where the expression is assignable, you can use '='
  myAccessor: '=' // in directive's template change myAccessor() to myAccessor
}

The removed `inject` wasn't generaly useful for directives so there should be no code using it.
